title: 'Barron knows all about you': Is Donald Trump obsessed with his 18-year-old son?
content: Donald Trump said podcasts, TikTok are a whole new world to him and he is now on TikTok. "Barron knows all about you. He knows guys I have never heard of like Adin Ross. I'd say who are they and he would say they are very big. You gotta do it. He's very smart," Donald Trump said.
summary: Donald Trump said podcasts, TikTok are a whole new world to him and he is now on TikTok. "Barron knows all about you. He knows guys I have never heard of like Adin Ross. I'd say who are they and he would say they are very big. You gotta do it. He's very smart," Donald Trump said.

title: Why are Harry and Meghan leading separate lives? Local newspaper says...
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have stirred speculation about their relationship, with reports suggesting a potential split as they make more individual appearances. However, conflicting reports of a new vacation home in Portugal add to the confusion. They might either be heading for a divorce, separating professionally, or simply letting rumors circulate while focusing on their careers. After the rumors circulated in the UK, now Montecito Journal in California reported the same.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have stirred speculation about their relationship, with reports suggesting a potential split as they make more individual appearances. However, conflicting reports of a new vacation home in Portugal add to the confusion. They might either be heading for a divorce, separating professionally, or simply letting rumors circulate while focusing on their careers. After the rumors circulated in the UK, now Montecito Journal in California reported the same.

title: Donald Trump's ex-wife condemns 'Hitler' jibe: 'This is my daughter's father...'
content: ​Former chief of staff of the Trump administration John Kelly criticized the former president and said he fit the dictionary definition of a 'fascist'. He also said Trump used to praise Adolf Hitler. Vice president Kamala Harris cited John Kelly's statement and said it was deeply troubling that Donald Trump would invoke Hitler.
summary: ​Former chief of staff of the Trump administration John Kelly criticized the former president and said he fit the dictionary definition of a 'fascist'. He also said Trump used to praise Adolf Hitler. Vice president Kamala Harris cited John Kelly's statement and said it was deeply troubling that Donald Trump would invoke Hitler.

title: 10 things Donald Trump told Joe Rogan in 3-hour podcast
content: Donald Trump said his biggest mistake during his time in the White House was hiring "bad people, or disloyal people". For example, he took the name of John Kelly who recently called Donald Trump a fascist and an admirer of Hitler. Trump said John Kelly is a bully. "I picked some people that I shouldn’t have picked.”
summary: Donald Trump said his biggest mistake during his time in the White House was hiring "bad people, or disloyal people". For example, he took the name of John Kelly who recently called Donald Trump a fascist and an admirer of Hitler. Trump said John Kelly is a bully. "I picked some people that I shouldn’t have picked.”

title: 'Epstein talked about Trump all the time': Ex-model who accused Donald of groping her
content: Stacy Williams, the former model, who accused Donald Trump of groping her in 1993 in front of Jeffrey Epstein revealed that Epstein berated her after the incident for allowing Donald Trump to touch her breasts, waist and buttocks. She said Epstein used to talk about Donald Trump a lot. "I would say that he talked about having just seen Donald or having just done something, I mean, every time we spoke," Williams said.
summary: Stacy Williams, the former model, who accused Donald Trump of groping her in 1993 in front of Jeffrey Epstein revealed that Epstein berated her after the incident for allowing Donald Trump to touch her breasts, waist and buttocks. She said Epstein used to talk about Donald Trump a lot. "I would say that he talked about having just seen Donald or having just done something, I mean, every time we spoke," Williams said.

title: Pakistan suicide bombing: Blast near Afghan border claims eight lives, including security officers
content: A suicide bomber killed eight people and injured five in an explosion at a checkpoint near Mir Ali, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. This follows a similar attack in Dera Ismail Khan, both incidents highlighting the increased terrorism since the Taliban's resurgence in Afghanistan.
summary: A suicide bomber killed eight people and injured five in an explosion at a checkpoint near Mir Ali, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. This follows a similar attack in Dera Ismail Khan, both incidents highlighting the increased terrorism since the Taliban's resurgence in Afghanistan.

title: 'It nicked right there': Trump shows first assassination attempt scar during Joe Rogan interview
content: In a recent interview with Joe Rogan, former President Donald Trump revealed the scar he got from an assassination attempt in July during a campaign rally. Trump, 78, reflected on the dangers of being president, highlighting the media’s role in portraying him negatively. Rogan suggested that inflammatory comparisons contributed to violent actions against Trump.
summary: In a recent interview with Joe Rogan, former President Donald Trump revealed the scar he got from an assassination attempt in July during a campaign rally. Trump, 78, reflected on the dangers of being president, highlighting the media’s role in portraying him negatively. Rogan suggested that inflammatory comparisons contributed to violent actions against Trump.

title: Trump says Kamala Harris is 'same' as Biden, shares video of similar remarks
content: Donald Trump equated Kamala Harris to Joe Biden, sharing a video highlighting their similar language and policy positions. He criticised Harris for attending a dance party with Beyonce. Trump is set to speak at a rally featuring prominent figures like Elon Musk, Mike Johnson, and Tucker Carlson, among others, on Sunday.
summary: Donald Trump equated Kamala Harris to Joe Biden, sharing a video highlighting their similar language and policy positions. He criticised Harris for attending a dance party with Beyonce. Trump is set to speak at a rally featuring prominent figures like Elon Musk, Mike Johnson, and Tucker Carlson, among others, on Sunday.

title: US elections 2024: Beyoncé lights up Houston rally in support of Kamala Harris
Washington Post's decision to not endorse US presidential candidate sparks uproar
content: The Washington Post’s choice to stop endorsing candidates in the 2024 presidential election has drawn criticism and resignations. Jeff Bezos reportedly initiated the change, leading to accusations of prioritizing business interests. Former editor Marty Baron and subscribers voiced strong dissatisfaction, seeing it as a threat to democracy and journalistic integrity.
summary: The Washington Post’s choice to stop endorsing candidates in the 2024 presidential election has drawn criticism and resignations. Jeff Bezos reportedly initiated the change, leading to accusations of prioritizing business interests. Former editor Marty Baron and subscribers voiced strong dissatisfaction, seeing it as a threat to democracy and journalistic integrity.

title: Nasa astronaut recently back from space station hospitalised, condition stable
content: A Nasa astronaut remains hospitalized in stable condition after the SpaceX Crew-8 mission's return from the ISS, where they spent 235 days in space. Following standard medical evaluations, three crew members were cleared and released, while one continues to undergo further medical checks as a precaution.
summary: A Nasa astronaut remains hospitalized in stable condition after the SpaceX Crew-8 mission's return from the ISS, where they spent 235 days in space. Following standard medical evaluations, three crew members were cleared and released, while one continues to undergo further medical checks as a precaution.

title: Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris: 6 interesting facts about US Elections 2024
content: The US political arena is abuzz as Donald Trump faces Kamala Harris in the 2024 Presidential elections. Joe Biden stepped down due to health concerns and endorsed Harris, potentially making her the first female President. Early voting is available in 47 states, with independent candidates also playing significant roles in this tight race.
summary: The US political arena is abuzz as Donald Trump faces Kamala Harris in the 2024 Presidential elections. Joe Biden stepped down due to health concerns and endorsed Harris, potentially making her the first female President. Early voting is available in 47 states, with independent candidates also playing significant roles in this tight race.

title: Musk defends $1 million daily giveaway following warning over violation of federal election law
content: Elon Musk defended his super PAC's $1 million daily giveaway, aimed at promoting constitutional rights, amidst DOJ concerns it may violate laws against paying for voter registration. The initiative targets registered voters in seven battleground states, endorsing support for the First and Second Amendments.
summary: Elon Musk defended his super PAC's $1 million daily giveaway, aimed at promoting constitutional rights, amidst DOJ concerns it may violate laws against paying for voter registration. The initiative targets registered voters in seven battleground states, endorsing support for the First and Second Amendments.

title: Delta Air Line sues CrowdStrike over 'catastrophic' software update that prompted mass flight cancellations
content: Delta is suing cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike after a July outage caused by a faulty software update led to massive flight cancellations and $500 million in losses. The lawsuit claims CrowdStrike's untested update disrupted 8.5 million PCs globally, severely impacting Delta's operations. CrowdStrike denies liability, citing Delta's outdated IT infrastructure.
summary: Delta is suing cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike after a July outage caused by a faulty software update led to massive flight cancellations and $500 million in losses. The lawsuit claims CrowdStrike's untested update disrupted 8.5 million PCs globally, severely impacting Delta's operations. CrowdStrike denies liability, citing Delta's outdated IT infrastructure.
